QuestData.Title: The Hand of Doubt
QuestData.Description:
Quickly! We have no time to lose. Lysonia has weakened Eridia to the point that she may fall. Our Paragon will do what she can, but we must intervene.
We will challenge Lysonia, and perhaps buy Eridia more time.
This so-called Hand of Doubt will make no easy foe. Stand ready, $n.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Vesiphone, Paragon of Purity.
QuestData.RewardText:
That you should join us now, on the precipice of this treachery, is curious.
<The Paragon of Purity studies you with a piercing gaze.>
You have done well. The Archon will know of your contributions this day.
